hero.title: Move better. Live better.
hero.subtitle: Pilates, Barre, Yoga & Functional training in Poblenou.

about.title: A modern wellness studio in Poblenou
about.description: NewVillage is a movement studio in the heart of the 22@ district. We offer Pilates, Barre, Yoga and Functional training in small groups, with bilingual classes and total flexibility.

disciplines.title: Choose how you want to move
disciplines.subtitle: One membership. Four ways to train.
disciplines.sectionTitle: MOVE IN DIFFERENT WAYS. FEEL THE DIFFERENCE
disciplines.sectionSubtitle: FOUR DISCIPLINES THAT COMPLEMENT EACH OTHER TO CREATE A COMPLETE, CONSCIOUS, AND CURRENT WORKOUT.
disciplines.barreDetailText: Strength, control and resistance are found in an intense, precise, and addictive practice.
disciplines.pilatesDetailSubtitle: OUR PILATES MAT, DIRECT TO THE CENTER
disciplines.pilatesDetailText: Deep strength, control and flow for a strong, precise and conscious body.
disciplines.functionalDetailSubtitle: ONE WORKOUT. YOUR WHOLE BODY IN ACTION
disciplines.functionalDetailText: Zone-focused sessions that combine to activate the whole body.
disciplines.functionalProgram1Text: Global work to activate all muscle groups
disciplines.functionalProgram2Text: Strength and definition in arms and back
disciplines.functionalProgram3Text: Stability, control and strength in the core
disciplines.functionalProgram4Text: Power and toning of the lower body
disciplines.functionalProgram5Text: Full body with focus on strength and resistance
disciplines.yogaDetailText: Fluid and conscious sequences to move with focus, lightness and balance
disciplines.yogaProgram1Text: Strength, energy and balance in movement
disciplines.yogaProgram2Text: Flow with your breath and connect with your body

ctaSection.text: MOVING BETTER STARTS BY CHOOSING WHERE

contact.description: We're here to help you. Write to us or visit us.

pricing.title: Find your ideal plan
pricing.subtitle: Train at your own pace. No long-term commitment.

community.title: More than classes, a community

meta.title: NewVillage Poblenou | Pilates, Barre, Yoga & Functional Training 22@
meta.description: Pilates, barre, yoga and functional training studio in Poblenou – 22@ Barcelona. Bilingual classes, no long-term commitment. Book your class.

faqs.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faqs.q1: WHAT DO I NEED TO BRING TO MY FIRST CLASS?
faqs.a1: We recommend bringing comfortable sportswear, a water bottle, and a small towel. We provide all necessary equipment for classes, including mats.
faqs.a2: Not at all! Our classes are designed to suit all levels. Our instructors will guide you and offer modifications according to your needs.
faqs.q3: CAN I CANCEL OR CHANGE MY BOOKING?
faqs.a3: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your class up to 12 hours before the session starts through your account or the app.
faqs.a4: Yes, we offer private sessions for individuals and small groups. Contact us for more information on rates and availability.
faqs.q5: DO YOU HAVE CHANGING ROOMS AND SHOWERS?
faqs.a5: Yes, we have full changing rooms with showers and lockers so you can change comfortably before and after your practice.
